item.title: Sunken manhole on new resurfaced rd, 31st July
item.description:
Since resurfacing this week, new resurfaced road, manhole cover already broken and sinking, already 6 inches deep, contractor did poor job, risk of accidents due to depth of hole
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 135, West End Lane, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Yet more fly tipping, 31st July
item.description:
I have never seen this area clear of waste and fly tipping. Currently some builders waste and general waste clearly visible from the road. Multiple pockets of fly tipping and waste in this location.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West Heath Road, Abbey Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Assorted waste and fly tipping, 31st July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hurst Lane, West Heath, London

item.title: Am hurst Parade N16 grass and weeds need cutting, 31st July
item.description:
Grass and weeds need cutting on both of this road and litter, left cardboard boxes used as seats on grassy areas. Hackney council needs to clean the place.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Amhurst Park, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Weeds growing through tarmac in cemetary, 31st July
item.description:
I reported this several weeks ago - and haven't heard anything from you - is this your responsibility or the churches ? The holes in the tarmac are becoming weed beds that need tackling early - most visitors to the cemetary are elderly- this is a trip hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Priory Avenue, Goddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Glass , dog faeces and overgrown bushes., 31st July
item.description:
There has been broken glass at the Sussex Road width restrictor and at the Swanton Road end for over three weeks. There are also large bushes overhanging the path that are making it difficult to pass other people using the alleyway. The alley is generally filled with litter and dog faeces.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Sussex Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wilderton Road N16 needs to be cleaned properly., 31st July
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wilderton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
